steps.title: RAG Workflow Overview
steps.description: The Vector Store RAG template shows two flows: Load Data (bottom) and Retriever (top)

steps.title: Load Data Flow
steps.description: This flow loads documents, splits them into chunks, creates embeddings, and stores in a vector database

steps.title: File Component
steps.description: Select your knowledge documents (PDFs, TXT, etc.) to load into the system

steps.title: Split Text Component
steps.description: Chunk Size: 1000 characters, Overlap: 200 characters for optimal retrieval

steps.title: OpenAI Embeddings
steps.description: Convert text chunks into vector representations using text-embedding-3-small

steps.title: Language Model
steps.description: GPT-4o-mini generates answers based on retrieved context (also supports GPT-4, o1, etc.)

steps.title: Playground Chat
steps.description: Test your AI Copilot with questions - it retrieves relevant context and generates answers

steps.title: Complete RAG Pipeline
steps.description: Your AI Copilot is ready! Documents are indexed and retrievable via natural language queries
